A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's an amazing movie with twists and turns you won't see coming until right before they happen. I have trouble ranking the Star Wars movies because they each bring something new to the table. Tentatively\, I'm going to rank as just below The Force Awakens. I have never seen a Star Wars movie that I didn't at least like a little (even Episode 2 wasn't all bad) so I admit to being a fanboy. I don't know why people are rating this one so poorly on this site. I haven't talked to anyone who didn't love it
